definition: Tongjia River in Manchuria, a tributary of the Yalu River 鴨綠江|鸭绿江[Ya1 lu4 Jiang1]

sentences.english: Why may Fan Bing Bing and Tong Da Wei perform such TV?
sentences.chinese: 为什么范冰冰和佟大为会出演这样的电视呢？

sentences.english: Captain Tong is typical of most Chinese river boat captains.
sentences.chinese: 佟船长是典型的中国河轮船长。

sentences.english: Captain Tong makes his way upstream toward the magnificent temple called Shibaozhai or Stone Precious Temple.
sentences.chinese: 佟船长速将前往的宏伟庙宇名叫石宝寨。

sentences.english: Captain Tong is heading toward the city of ghosts, a temple overlooking the port of Feng Du.
sentences.chinese: 佟船长要前往鬼城，这是丰都上方的一座庙宇。

sentences.english: Tong married Guan at the end of last year after a seven-year love marathon.(See photo)
sentences.chinese: 佟大为和关悦经过7年爱情长跑，于去年底登记结婚。

sentences.english: After the lecture, Prof. Tong Xin answered audiences' questions patiently.
sentences.chinese: 讲座之后，佟老师耐心地为听众解答问题。

definition: solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
surname Di/variant of 狄[Di2], generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
edge of a tortoiseshell/see 冉冉[ran3 ran3]
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
